ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Scintillation index (S4) obtained by single-frequency GPS receivers at Kototabang, Indonesia (text format)
ResourceHeader.Description: Scintillation index (S4) calculated from intensities of the GPS L1 signals observed by single-frequency GPS receivers at a sampling rate of 20 Hz at Kototabang, Indonesia.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If you would like to use this data for scientific purpose, please contact the PI, Yuichi Otsuka of Institute for Space-Earth Environmental Research, Nagoya University, Furo-cho, Chikusa-ku, Nagoya, Aichi 464-8601, Japan. Please refer "Otsuka, Y., K. Shiokawa, and T. Ogawa, Equatorial ionospheric scintillations and zonal irregularity drifts observed with closely-spaced GPS receivers in Indonesia, J. Meteor. Soc. Japan, 84A, 343-351, 2006".

AccessURL.Name: Website of Scintillation Index (S4) and Drift Velocity
AccessURL.Description: Scintillation index (S4) calculated from intensities of the GPS L1 signals observed by single-frequency GPS receivers at a sampling rate of 20 Hz at Kototabang, Indonesia.

NumericalData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE, Ionosphere, scintillation, GPS, plasma bubble

Parameter.Name: scintillation index (S4)
Parameter.Description: Amplitude scintillation index (S4) of GPS L1 signal
